meico.mpm.elements.styles

Class MetricalAccentuationStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.styles.GenericStyle<AccentuationPatternDef>
        • meico.mpm.elements.styles.MetricalAccentuationStyle

  • public class MetricalAccentuationStyle
extends GenericStyle<AccentuationPatternDef>
    This class interfaces metrical accentuation style definitions. Basically, these define a string and and assotiate it with an instance of AccentuationPatternDef.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
